testCase.name: offlineStorage saveReportOffline should save a report to IndexedDB
offlineStorage getPendingReports should return pending reports
offlineStorage updateReportStatus should update a report status
offlineStorage saveFileForOfflineUpload should save file data
offlineStorage getPendingFileUploads should return pending uploads
offlineStorage deleteFileUpload should delete a file upload
OfflineAwareContainerMain renders children when online
OfflineAwareContainerMain shows offline message when offline and page not cached
OfflineAwareContainerMain renders children with offline banner when not showing full page
VerifiedDisasterTable renders ongoing disasters table correctly
VerifiedDisasterTable renders closed disasters table correctly
VerifiedDisasterTable shows "No ongoing disasters found" when there are none
VerifiedDisasterTable shows "No closed disasters found" when there are none
VerifiedDisasterTable navigates to disaster details when View Details is clicked
VerifiedDisasterTable handles invalid date formats gracefully
PreLocationSelector renders with initial empty state
PreLocationSelector updates when district is selected
PreLocationSelector handles both district and division selection
PreLocationSelector initializes with provided district and division
